name: BurnoutWatch
signal_source: Workplace research shows users experience 'fatigue that lingers no matter how much sleep you get' and need 'early warning systems for burnout'
description: Personal burnout monitoring app that tracks subtle energy and engagement patterns to provide early exhaustion warnings
target_user: Working professionals who struggle to recognize burnout symptoms before they become severe and impact performance
pain_point_evidence: Users report 'difficulties in focusing and making decisions' as early signs that are 'usually combined with both physical tiredness and emotional exhaustion'
differentiation: Personal early detection vs. enterprise monitoring, focuses on prevention rather than treatment
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced pattern analysis, personalized recovery plans, and team sharing features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic tracking, premium for advanced analytics and recovery plans
